rows.label: kizunatalk003_msg0003
rows.name:
Yes, if we falter here,
Alst will be destroyed.

rows.label: kizunatalk003_msg0004
rows.name:
If that happens,n
ot only our loved ones but all
innocent people will disappear.

rows.label: kizunatalk003_msg0006
rows.name:
But we carry the feelings entrustedn
to us by Shin, the people of Iira,
and everyone in Alst...

rows.label: kizunatalk003_msg0007
rows.name:
We've run into all kinds
of trouble on the way,
but we made it this far.

rows.label: kizunatalk003_msg0008
rows.name:
The obstacle before us is greater
than ever, but let's overcome it
like we've done before.

rows.label: kizunatalk003_msg0009
rows.name:
With everyone together,
we can definitely overcome anything!

rows.label: kizunatalk003_msg0010
rows.name: Everyone, this is the final battle!

rows.label: kizunatalk003_msg0011
rows.name:
Let's show them the power
of the bond between
Driver and Blade!
